<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script will change the Asset interceptor's answer from License to Software Entitlement.</description>
        <name>Change Asset's interceptor answer</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function changeAnswer(sysId) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_wizard_answer');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
	gr.addQuery('name', 'License');
	gr.addQuery('answer', 'License');
	gr.addQuery('active', 'true');
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('name', 'Software Entitlement');
		gr.setValue('answer', 'Software Entitlement');
		gr.update();
	}
}

var SOFTWARE_ENTITLEMENT_SYSID = 'cfbd237047622100158b949b6c9a719b';
changeAnswer(SOFTWARE_ENTITLEMENT_SYSID);
]]></script>
